grading_explanation.relevance: 1.5/2 – Skills listed include machine learning, deep learning, and AI system design which are relevant for roles like AI Engineer or ML Engineer, but there is no mention of experience with programming languages specific to these roles such as HTML, JS, SQL.

grading_debug.notes: The candidate has a good set of skills and achievements relevant to an AI-related role.
